lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Saudi Arabian oil minister Hisham Nazer yesterday reiterated the kingdom's commitment to the December OPEC accord and said it would never sell below official prices.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The production figures include neutral zone output but not sales from floating storage, which are generally considered part of a country's output for Opec purposes.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They put crude oil exports through Yanbu at 100,000 bpd last month, compared to zero in January, while throughput at Bahrain's refinery and neutral zone production remained steady at around 200,000 bpd each.
